guide.introduction:
See this thing in action:

[youtube]

(in that video i used; one red led, 2X uvled, white led)

Strawduino - how do you drink your light? - original idea by zodemon

With this technique you can make cool looking

straw-displays, in dark it WILL amaze you.

and it'll be enough bright to lighten up the room bit.

--how to make strawduino--

First go to your shop and get normal party straws, big ones not the thin ones, also make sure they can be extended/folded. then get some leds. Red, green and blue work the best, UV-led is cool in dark but is not bright. White led works too and its bright enough to fill the room with light.

Now go and upload some code to your arduino that'll flash leds.

Put one straw on one led. make sure you use the end that usualy goes to the glass so that the end wich can be extended and folded is on top, if you want you can make cool looking hi-light part on the straw by extending that fold part. now put your leds on arduino, or use a prototype board.

make the connections, shut down the lights, and start arduino and be amazed!

tip: If you want to keep it in order and straight, tape them together.
